metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0806 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Qualcomm Wi-Fi driver in the kernel in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.x before 5.1.1 LMY49G, and 6.x before 2016-02-01 allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug 25344453.

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
